front.court: MADURAI BENCH OF MADRAS HIGH COURT
front.extra:
,
Avaniyapuram Police Station,
Madurai.
...Respondents
Prayer : Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of
India to issue a Writ of Mandamus, directing the second
respondent to consider and dispose the petitioner's representation,
dated 05.12.2019 within stipulated time may be fixed by this
Court, which is relating to grant police protection, while fencing
the society situated at A2468, Sinthamani Valarkalai Milk Producer
Co-operative Society, Sinthamani, Madurai-625 009.
For Petitioner :

By consent of both parties, this writ petition is taken up
for final disposal at the stage of admission itself.
